gist.headline: New bloom: ImageGenAI Pro
gist.blurb: A new flower has opened in the Creative garden. ImageGenAI Pro is here to help you stretch your imagination (and your aspect ratios).
gist.summary: Added ImageGenAI Pro to the community showcase, offering image generation with flexible aspect ratio support.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access ImageGenAI Pro directly from the apps list for more versatile image creation.
gist.visual_concept: An art studio in the garden. Polly the bee is the artist, emphasizing the 'Creative' category. The focus is on 'aspect ratios', so we depict a canvas or frame being stretched or resized.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny painter's beret, working on a glowing digital canvas in a garden studio. A chunky robot companion holds a golden frame that stretches wide. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
